{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Tenda AC23.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC2100 Dual Band Gigabit WiFi Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.tendacn.com/us/product/ac23.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Tenda_AC23 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Tenda |model = AC23 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC2100 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = V7TAC23 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 10041361 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8197FH; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = BoHong;BH25Q64BS; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8367RB; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = IEEE802.3, IEEE802.3u,IEEE802.3ab |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 50:0F:F5 |oui = 50:0F:F5
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = Tenda_XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^Tenda_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/10/2019 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B088K9HCJB |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Realtek;RTL8814BR; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1733 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== <!-- "10038043" and "V2.1" is silkscreened on the top of the board in the FCC photos. --> * Web GUI: http://tendawifi.com
*[https://www.acwifi.net/8338.html ''Tenda AC23 Teardown'' on '''AC|WiFi'''] :Flash: ''BoHong'' [https://sites.google.com/a/logictech.kr/home/bohong-microelectronics---serial-flash BH25Q64BS] (H25S64)
==See also== ===Models=== :;[https://www.tendacn.com/en/product/forhome-22.html Wireless Routers] â€¢ [[List of Tenda Wireless Devices]] *[[Tenda AC23]] - AC2100 Dual Band Gigabit WiFi Router *[[Tenda AC21]] - AC2100 Dual Band Gigabit WiFi Router *[[Tenda AC19]] - AC2100 Dual Band Gigabit WiFi Router *[[Tenda AC18]] - AC1900 Smart Dual-Band Gigabit WiFi Router *[[Tenda AC15]] - AC1900 Smart Dual-Band Gigabit WiFi Router *[[Tenda AC11]] - AC1200 Smart Dual-Band Gigabit WiFi Router *[[Tenda AC10U]] - AC1200 Smart Dual-Band Gigabit WiFi Router *[[Tenda AC10]] - AC1200 Smart Dual-Band Gigabit WiFi Router *[[Tenda AC9]] (v3) - AC1200 Smart Dual-Band Gigabit WiFi Router *[[Tenda AC8]] - AC1200 Dual-Band Gigabit Wireless Router *[[Tenda AC7]] - AC1200 Smart Dual-Band WiFi Router *[[Tenda AC6]] - AC1200 Smart Dual-Band WiFi Router *[[Tenda AC6 V2]] - AC1200 Smart Dual-Band WiFi Router *[[Tenda AC5]] - AC1200 Smart Dual-Band WiFi Router *[[Tenda AC5 V3]] - AC1200 Dual Band WiFi Router
